participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and determined, Emma is driven by her dreams of becoming a lawyer. She is adventurous and enjoys the idea of city life while cherishing her rural upbringing.
participant_1.background: i was raised on a horse farm. my family has raised horses for generations. i dream of moving to the city. i want to be a lawyer.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Caring and supportive, James takes pride in his daughter's achievements and balances his professional life as a doctor with family time. He has a whimsical side, enjoying light-hearted movies.
participant_2.background: my daughter is a child prodigy. i enjoy going to the park. i am a doctor. i am now looking for a new job. my favorite movie is friday.
